question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Green Climate Fund?
1. The World Bank serves as the interim trustee of the GCF.
2. The GCF was created to support projects, programmes, policies and other activities in developed country Parties.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The World Bank serves as the interim trustee of the GCF. The GCF was created to support projects, programmes, policies and other activities in developing country Parties. It was established in CoP 16 at Cancun Summit.
